ygData.subject: Re: Planes Raids
ygData.msgSnippet: Try going to everquestraids.com and joining that. You don t have to pay for membership, tho it would help keep the site going. It is used by my guild on the
ygData.messageBody:
Try going to everquestraids.com and joining that.
You don't have to pay for membership, tho it would
help keep the site going.<br>It is used by my guild on
the server I use(Bristlebane). But I have noticed
that not all servers get as much use out of it. The
concept is the guild or the player lists when and where
they want to raid and other players sign up and join
them. Each raid gets a log page for messages relating
to that raid.<br>I can't wait till I'm high enough
to actually get some benefit from the
site.<br><br>Babinn<br>16 Ranger<br>Bristlebane
